ruleset_version.description: The version of the parsed ruleset if available

error.description: The single error which prevented parsing the configuration
The single error which prevented parsing this object

loaded.description: A list of the unique identifiers from successfully loaded elements

failed.description: A list of the unique identifiers from the elements which couldn't be loaded

skipped.description: A list of the unique identifiers from the elements which were skipped due to explicit incompatibility (e.g. min/max version)

errors.description: Each key corresponds to a parsing error, each value corresponds to a list of the unique identifiers of the elements which failed with said error

warnings.description: Each key corresponds to a parsing warning, each value corresponds to a list of the unique identifiers of the elements which failed with said warnings
